pages.text: $(#630000)Gravity causes the afflicted to be thrown to the ground via unknown force, dealing high damage. If the afflicted is on fire, the damage will pierce most forms of defense.
$(#630000)Those $(l:threat/enhanced_mobs)Enhanced Mobs$()$(#630000) appear to apply this with Motes if something is too high up in the air. I should refrain from jumping too high or flying near them.
